languages.text: "Нет, вы слышали? Немезит не только в литейном отсеке отличился, он теперь и по верхним палубам ходит! Говорят, в корабельный храм наведался, каких-то господ пострелял".

traits.locale_text: "Нет, вы слышали? Немезит не только в литейном отсеке отличился, он теперь и по верхним палубам ходит! Говорят, в корабельный храм наведался, каких-то зажравшихся господ пострелял".

languages.text: "Did you hear what happened? Nemesite didn't stop at that foundry business, he's been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."
languages.original_text: "Нет, вы слышали? Немезит не только в литейном отсеке отличился, он теперь и по верхним палубам ходит! Говорят, в корабельный храм наведался, каких-то господ пострелял".

traits.locale_text: "Did you hear what happened? Not only has Nemesite made a splash in the foundry bay, he has been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."
"Did you hear what happened? Not only has Nemesite made a splash in the foundry bay, he has been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."
"Did you hear what happened? Not only has Nemesite made a splash in the foundry bay, he has been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."
"Did you hear what happened? Not only has Nemesite made a splash in the foundry bay, he has been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."
"Did you hear what happened? Nemesite didn't stop at that foundry business, he's been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."
"Did you hear what happened? Nemesite didn't stop at that foundry business, he's been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."

languages.text: "Habt Ihr gehört, was geschehen ist? Nemesit hat die Gießerei nicht gereicht, er treibt auch auf den Oberdecks sein Unwesen! Angeblich ist er zum Schrein des Schiffs gegangen und hat ein paar Adlige erschossen."
languages.original_text: "Did you hear what happened? Nemesite didn't stop at that foundry business, he's been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr gehört, was geschehen ist? Nemesit hat die Gießerei nicht gereicht, er treibt auch auf den Oberdecks sein Unwesen! Angeblicih ist er zum Schrein des Schiffs gegangen und hat ein paar Adlige erschossen."

languages.text: «¿Habéis oído lo que ha pasado? Nemesitio no se ha conformado con lo de la fundición; ¡también ha estado rondando por las cubiertas superiores! Dicen que fue al templo de la nave y disparó a unos nobles».
languages.original_text: "Did you hear what happened? Nemesite didn't stop at that foundry business, he's been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."

traits.locale_text: «¿Habéis oído lo que ha pasado? Nemesitio no se ha conformado con lo de la fundición; ¡también ha estado rondando por las cubiertas superiores! Dicen que fue al templo de la nave y disparó a unos nobles».

languages.text: 「何が起きたか知ってるか？ネメサイトは鋳造工場での仕事にとどまらず、上層デッキにも足を伸ばしているらしい！船の神殿に行って、帰属どもを撃ったらしいぜ」
languages.original_text: "Did you hear what happened? Nemesite didn't stop at that foundry business, he's been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."

traits.locale_text: 「何が起きたか知ってるか？ネメサイトは鋳造工場での仕事にとどまらず、上層デッキにも足を伸ばしているらしい！船の神殿に行って、帰属どもを撃ったらしいぜ」

languages.text: “你们听说发生的事情了吗？涅墨斯特不仅仅去了铸造甲板，还跑到了上层甲板！大家都说他去了船上的礼拜堂，还开枪打死了几个官老爷。”
languages.original_text: "Did you hear what happened? Nemesite didn't stop at that foundry business, he's been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."

traits.locale_text: “你们听说发生的事情了吗？涅墨斯特不仅仅去了铸造甲板，还跑到了上层甲板！大家都说他去了船上的礼拜堂，还开枪打死了几个官老爷。”

languages.text: « T'as entendu la nouvelle ? Némésite ne s'est pas contenté de la fonderie, non, il a même investi les ponts supérieurs ! On dit même qu'il aurait atteint le sanctuaire du vaisseau et qu'il aurait tué des nobles. »
languages.original_text: "Did you hear what happened? Nemesite didn't stop at that foundry business, he's been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."

traits.locale_text: « T'as entendu la nouvelle ? Némésite ne s'est pas contenté de la fonderie, non, il a même investi les ponts supérieurs ! On dit même qu'il aurait atteint le sanctuaire du vaisseau et qu'il aurait tué des nobles. »

languages.text: "Olanları duydun mu? Nemezit, dökümhaneyle sınırlı kalmamış. Üst güvertelerde de dolanıyormuş! Anlatılanlara göre geminin mabedine gidip birkaç soyluyu vurmuş."
languages.original_text: "Did you hear what happened? Nemesite didn't stop at that foundry business, he's been roaming the upper decks too! They say he went to the vessel's shrine and shot some nobles."
